data.title: Mediterranean sardine salad
ingredients: 2 x 120g cans sardines in tomato sauce, drained and sauce reserved

method.steps_editor_conten: Divide the salad leaves between 4 plates, then sprinkle over the olives and capers. Roughly break up the sardines and add to the salad. Mix the tomato sauce with the oil and vinegar and drizzle over the salad.
